nodes.bodyText: Let's use the same naming approach here. It has to be NODE_DISK_LIST_TYPE or NODE_DISKS_TYPE.
Probably we can use TEST_INT here similarly to TEST_STRING.
Could you please also check that the response file name is that we expects it to be. It is pretty important because it will be visible by the end user when he/she downloads the node usage report.
Could you please also add the similar test case which covers "toolInstances": false?
PMD expects us to get rid of all string literals duplications. So could you please extract variables for regionId, toolInstances and etc.
